description.p: Welcome to the *[link:Alpha Anywhere Community Edition@https://www.alphasoftware.com/build-apps-for-free-community-edition-download]* Beginner's Tutorial. We'll show you how to build a simple "Hello, World!" application for a web browser and mobile device, all in about 15 minutes time.
This tutorial is broken into 3 chapters:

item.name: [Installing]
item.description: In this chapter, you will install and register Alpha Anywhere.

item.name: [Building]
item.description: Once Alpha Anywhere is installed, you'll become familiar with the development environment and the basics of creating an application.

item.name: [Testing]
item.description: In the final chapter, you'll learn how to test an application locally and on a remote device.

description.p: If you have two monitors, we recommend you keep this tutorial open on one monitor while you do the tutorial on the other monitor.
If you have one monitor, leave this tutorial open in your browser and use *[ui:Alt]*+*[ui:Tab]* to switch between Alpha Anywhere and this tutorial.
Let's get started. Click the button below to begin.
